question: Name the important tourist attractions in Teruel, Spain.
true_answer: Mausoleum of the Lovers of Teruel, El Torico, and Dinópolis.
asked_question_translated: Citez les principales attractions touristiques de Teruel, en Espagne.
answer: Les principales attractions touristiques de Teruel incluent la cathédrale de Santa María de Mediavilla, les tours mudéjares, le mausolée des Amants de Teruel et la Plaza del Torico.
answer_translated_eng: Teruel's main tourist attractions include the Cathedral of Santa María de Mediavilla, the Mudejar Towers, the Mausoleum of the Lovers of Teruel and the Plaza del Torico.
